hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Gossip Stone Shuffle must be on. I'm normally in Zora's Domain!

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Hylian Shield#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Lower Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Bottom

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Ganondorf brushes his rotten teeth with salted slug flavoured tooth paste!

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #0# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.
